mapper.insert: INSERT INTO courses(course_title, course_type, course_content) VALUES( #{courseTitle}, #{courseType}, #{courseContent});
mapper.select: SELECT c.course_id, c.course_title, c.course_type, c.course_content, c.created_at, COALESCE(cv.total_views, 0) AS total_view FROM courses c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT board_id, SUM(view_count) AS total_views FROM views GROUP BY board_id ) cv ON cv.board_id = c.course_id ORDER BY c.course_id LIMIT #{valueOfOnePage} OFFSET #{index};
